rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with a ramp and minimal threshold.
Art Deco inspired living space featuring geometric patterns and bold colors. Large windows for natural light.
A sunlit courtyard featuring decorative elements inspired by Art Deco style, surrounded by the building on three sides. Vastu compliant with open space center.
Modern kitchen equipped for accessibility, integrated within the ground floor plan, featuring ample storage and wheelchair-friendly layout.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible door with automatic opener.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, designed to complement the Art Deco aesthetic.

additional_features.description: Direct access from ground floor living area to expansive garden space, ensuring a seamless indoor-outdoor transition.
Specially designed ramp integrated into the entrance for smooth movement.
